# File lib/prawn/document.rb, line 361
    def render
      output = StringIO.new
      close_content_stream
      finalize_all_page_contents

      render_header(output)
      render_body(output)
      render_xref(output)
      render_trailer(output)
      str = output.string
      str.force_encoding("ASCII-8BIT") if str.respond_to?(:force_encoding)
      str
    end
